data.name: Sensual Adventures - Episode 5
data.detailed_description:
Please note: this is an interactive Episode in the Sensual Adventures Universe! Please read the "What's included" list so you know what you get, thanks!

Plot:
After an awkward and confusing night in Cairo, Brittany and Trinity are off to Barbados to take in some much needed rest and relaxation. While there, the futa girls take an interest in Jasmine, a sexy waitress working at the private resort they're staying at. Before the girls can ask Jasmine to join them, however, their urges get the best of them and they start fucking poolside in this interactive Episode in the Sensual Adventures Universe!

What's Included

  • Watch Episode 5 rendered in real time on your PC
  • Choose between pussy or anal, night or day, and music or no music.
  • Character customization to change hair, skin, wetness, and other features.
  • Plus Movie-maker mode!
  • Voice actresses Marie Fasolt, Deeji, and Milly Stern return as Brittany, Trinity, and Jasmine
  • 7 sex positions including mutual masturbation, double penetration, double blowjob, and more!

Movie-Maker features:
  • 6 Poses to choose from
  • Cumshots and/or Creampies for every pose
  • Free camera control
  • Auto-Camera mode, for a movie-like experience
  • Character switching for poses
  • Choose Anal or Pussy penetration

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: INTEL i5, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Additional Notes: Win7 & Win8 should also work
